content: be gay do crime balaclava pattern details the balaclava is worked in row back loop only for the entire piece the horns are worked in the round abbreviations chain = chain flo = front loop only half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet blo = back loop only single_crochet = single_crochet mc = magic_ring slip_stitch = slip_stitch increase = increase fo = fasten_off decrease = decrease sizing/finished measurements will fit 20-22 head comfortably see pattern notes for bigger sizes yarn used red heart super saver worsted weight color retro stripes recommended hook size 8 00 mm for balaclava 5 50 mm for horns other materials needed yarn needle pattern chain 54 r1 single_crochet 18 starting in second chain from the hook half_double_crochet 29 single_crochet 6 chain 1 turn in blo from this point on r2 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 29 single_crochet 18 chain 1 turn r3 single_crochet 18 half_double_crochet 29 single_crochet 6 chain 1 turn r4-14 repeat row 2 & 3 create the bottom panel r15 single_crochet 18 half_double_crochet 16 chain 1 turn r16 half_double_crochet 16 single_crochet 18 chain 1 turn r17-27 repeat row 15 & 16 do not fo do not cut yarn ★ for larger sizes repeat row 15 & 16 for 2 more row create the top panel r15 pull a loop through the back loop of the 16th stitch of row 14 then half_double_crochet 13 single_crochet 6 r16 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 13 chain 1 turn r17 half_double_crochet 13 single_crochet 6 chain 1 turn r18-26 repeat row 16 & 17 fo on the last stitch ★ for the top panel i pulled from the center of the yarn to be able to keep a working end on the bottom panel coming from the outside of the skein ★ for larger sizes repeat row 16 & 17 for 2 more row attach bottom panel to top panel r27 pick up yarn from row 27 of the bottom panel and join to row 26 of the top panel with 13 half_double_crochet then single_crochet 6 chain 1 turn r28 single_crochet 6 half_double_crochet 29 single_crochet 18 chain 1 turn r29 single_crochet 18 half_double_crochet 29 single_crochet 6 chain 1 turn r30-40 repeat row 28 & 29 join sides together put wrong sides together and slip_stitch loosely in flo of both sides to join thread a yarn needle and weave it through the openings in the top of the single_crochet 6 and cinch shut to close tie off tightly weave in ends tip stretch out the neck hole a little bit before you put it on horns r1 mc with 4 single_crochet inside r2 single_crochet 1 increase 1 x 2 r3 decrease 1 increase 4 r4 decrease 1 single_crochet 1 increase 1 x 3 single_crochet 1 r5 decrease 1
